title: New Modern Beautiful Luxury House
details: Solidly And Newly Built On 22 And 16 Perches. 4 Bed Rooms 3 Bath Rooms. Living . Dining. Pantry. Garage. Balconies. Parapet Wall. Facing Wide Carpet Road. Ac. Hot Water. Solar Power. Cctv. Sensor Gates. Space For A Swimming Pool. Inspection By Prior Appointments Only. Strictly No Brokers. Please Note That We Are Not Affiliated To Any Broker Or An Agent.
